page.title: 11Medical Care in the Area
page.content:
The two villages come together in this respect. Elsworth has no medical facilities and the population uses the Health Centre at Papworth Everard. Neither village has a dentist. A community car scheme is run in Elsworth for those who do not have transport to the surgery.
As 50% of the population of Papworth Everard is handicapped, health care is clearly important.
The hospital at Papworth is now a specialist one and has no casualty department. The nearest hospitals with these facilities are Hinchinbrooke Hospital at Huntingdon and Addenbrooke's in Cambridge.
